class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
       horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
       verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
       ii = 0
       jj = 0
       res = 0
       while ii < len(horizontalCut) or jj < len(verticalCut):
           curii = horizontalCut[ii] if ii < len(horizontalCut) else 0
           curjj = verticalCut[jj] if jj < len(verticalCut) else 0
           if curii > curjj or (curii == curjj and ii < jj):
               res += curii * (jj + 1)
               ii += 1
           else:
               res += curjj * (ii + 1)
               jj += 1
           # print(ii, jj, res)
       return res
